name: Air Destruct
description: Destroy one of your opponent's air character card.

name: Aqua Destruct
description: Destroy one of your opponent's water character card.

name: Flame Destruct
description: Destroy one of your opponent's fire character card.

name: Land Destruct
description: Destroy one of your opponent's earth character card.

name: The Destructor
description: Destroy one of your opponent's character card regardless the element.
